stories.title: рдзреЛрд░реЗ рдХрд╛ рдзрдХреНрдХрд╛ - Village Shock
stories.description: A powerful drama about love versus tradition in a Haryanvi village. When Sunita, daughter of wealthy landlord Ramesh, falls in love with farmer Vikas, the village faces its biggest challenge.

stories.title: рдкрдВрдЪрд╛рдпрдд рдХрд╛ рдлреИрд╕рд▓рд╛ - Council Decision
stories.description: A social drama showcasing the wisdom of Haryanvi panchayat system. When two families clash over land dispute, the village council must find a solution that brings justice and harmony.
